title: Google photos app freezes when saving edited pictures on Pixel 3
content: The app freezes when I try to save photos that I've edited. I'm able to edit the photos but after I click save, the screen goes black and there is a spinning wheel. The only solution is to swipe up and force close the app. It does not save the edits. I have restarted my phone, cleared the cache, emptied the trash. I have the app set so that photos that have been backed up are automatically deleted from the device after 60 days. But the photo app continues to freeze. Please help!!!
